member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.Caching.PosApiDataCacheIsolation
member.summary: Decorates . Cache keys are automatically extended to include because the return data from PosAPI vary depending on them. However isn't included because it's unique for each product hence no data would be shared across products of the label which improves the performance.

member.name: M:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.Caching.PosApiDataCacheIsolation.#ctor(Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.IPosApiDataCache,Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.IServiceClientsConfiguration)
member.summary: Decorates . Cache keys are automatically extended to include because the return data from PosAPI vary depending on them. However isn't included because it's unique for each product hence no data would be shared across products of the label which improves the performance.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.Caching.IStaticDataCache
member.summary: Stores data in and . Stores data in IMemoryCache and IDistributedCache to decrease number of requests to PosApi. When a server caches some information in local memory, it also caches it in distributed cache. Then another server that don't have a local copy in memory can re-use data from distributed cache, and don't have to send request to PosApi.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.Caching.IUserDataCache
member.summary: Stores data all in a single using .

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.Caching.IUserDataContainerManager
member.summary: Manages container with user data according to app context (e.g. HttpContext) - Loads them from distributed cache lazily when needed, then stored in the context. - Saves them back to distributed cache at the end of the context.

member.summary: Gets cached value for given key and data type or creates new one using given delegate and adds it into the cache. If expiration is not provided then it's calculated according to data type and . The execution of factory method is locked so that only single thread can create the value.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.IPosApiRestClient
member.summary: Central point that all PosAPI requests are supposed to pass through, the closest to REST infrastructure. It executes high-level as HTTP request accordingly and deserializes the result using Newtonsoft JSON to an object of given result type. If there is an error reported by PosAPI then it's deserialized to .

member.summary: Wrapping another will copy all custom properties.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.PosApiHeaders
member.summary: Provides typed access to all headers related to service clients.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.IPosApiRequestSemaphores
member.summary: Use semaphores to allow only one retrieval (mostly HTTP request) for particular data at time, first call makes the request, subsequent calls wait and will get cached value e.g. one req for currencies, one req for segmentation groups of current user. Because lock() isn't async so we use semaphores. Store semaphores in cache -> they expire -> avoids memory leak if keys don't ever reoccur b/c of their uniqueness e.g. session token.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.PosApiRestRequest
member.summary: Defines a REST request made to Pos API using .

member.summary: Gets or sets the URL. It has to be relative from configured PosAPI host and version.

member.summary: Indicates if the request should be authenticated thus posting security tokens. In that case user must be authenticated with PosAPI (full authentication or be in workflow).

member.summary: Gets or sets the object which should be serialized and posted.

member.name: T:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.IServiceClientsBaseConfiguration
member.summary: Exposes some generic service clients configuration consumed also by products to access backend services especially Sports Bet Content Distribution service.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the PosAPI service host. Default: https://api.bwin.com/.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the version of the PosAPI Service to use. Default: V3.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.AccessId
member.summary: Gets or sets the PosAPI Service access ID.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.StaticDataCacheTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the caching time for static data like languages, countries, currencies etc. Default: 1 hour.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.UserDataCacheTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the caching time for user data like balance, bets history etc. Default: 5 minutes.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.HealthInfoExpiration
member.summary: Time span that defines the expiration of PosApi health state coming from the PosApi health check or from operations that call PosApi. When this state expires the new PosApi health check request will be issued. The expiration timer is reset every time the health state is updated. Default: 15 seconds.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.Headers
member.summary: Gets or sets headers to append to PosAPI requests.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.TimeoutRules
member.summary: Specifies timeout for PosAPI calls. Multiple rules can be specified with regular expressions evaluated against the request URL and the first one that matches will be used.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.QueryParametersRules
member.summary: Specifies additional query parameters for PosAPI calls. Multiple rules can be specified with regular expressions evaluated against the request URL and the first one that matches will be used.

member.name: P:Frontend.Vanilla.ServiceClients.Infrastructure.ServiceClientsConfigurationBuilder.IsApiCacheUsageStatsLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether the Api cache usage statistics are logged or not.

member.summary: Optional array of methods to be matched (default is to all methods).
